title: FS: 20 Card Graded T205 Lot w/ Several SP's - PRICE DROP
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: 20 Card Graded T205 Lot w/ Several SP's - PRICE DROP
posts.post_content:
Hello.  I have the following T205 lot available.  As you can see by the scans, these are all lower grade cards although most present very well for the grade and a few are undergraded by a bit.  Payment via any method you prefer.  Please add $2.00 shipping for 1-2 cards.  3 or more ship for free.  Thanks for looking and please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve cards.  Thanks for looking!

Take the entire lot for $375 delivered.

CARDS PICTURED:

Barry SGC 10 - $16
Camnitz PSA 1 - $18
Crandall ("t" not crossed) PSA 1 - $17
Delahanty PSA 1 (tiny pinhole in bottom border) - $17
Dickson PSA 1 (undergraded by at least a full grade) - $20
Doyle PSA 1 - $18
Egan PSA 1 (also undergraded) - $18
Knight PSA 1 (Sovereign) - **SOLD**
A.P. Leifield PSA 1(MK) (Sovereign) - **SOLD**
Mattern PSA 1 - $14
McLean PSA 1.5 - $18
Meyers PSA 1 (I've seen worse looking PSA 3's) - $22
Oldring PSA 1 - $16
O'Leary PSA 1 - $18
Payne PSA 1 - $15
Scott PSA 1 - $14
Titus PSA 1 - $17
Turner PSA 1 - $23
Wiltse (both ears show) PSA 1 - $15
Wiltse (one ear shows) PSA 1 - $40
Bump for a price drop on remaining cards.  Thanks!
